hypothesis_content.title: BTC 20/50 EMA Golden Cross Momentum Acceleration
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC enters a NEUTRAL or BULL regime and its price crosses above both the 20-day and 50-day EMAs within a 3-day window, a sustained uptrend will follow, with price appreciating by at least 8% over the next 10 trading days without breaching the 50-day EMA.
hypothesis_content.rationale: In neutral-to-bullish environments, the simultaneous reclaim of two key medium-term moving averages signals a consolidation of buyer control and a shift in medium-term momentum. The volume confirmation filters for false breakouts. This setup often precedes institutional and trend-follower re-engagement.
entry_conditions: The 20-day EMA is above the 50-day EMA (or crosses above on the same day)
Volume on breakout day is > 15% above 20-day average volume

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price reaches 8% gain from entry close
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Daily close falls below the 50-day EMA

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Median 10-day return after signal is less than 3% OR win rate is below 55% after 100+ historical simulations across varying volatility regimes.
